name: test_e2e_with_logs[280_API_MASS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_MASS_001` |
| **Name** | Mass Assignment - Role Escalation |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | mass_assignment |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"username":"user","role":"admin","isAdmin":true}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22username%22%3A%22user%22%2C%22role%22%3A%22admin%22%2C%22isAdmin%22%3Atrue%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~1000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:34:54.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `API Security Attack Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX API Attack] API security vulnerability detected test_id=API_MASS_001-1768052094213-djfozq pattern_id=API_MASS_001 uri=/?q=%7B%22username%22%3A%22user%22%2C%22role%22%3A%22admin%22%2C%22isAdmin%22%3Atrue%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |
